extendedIngredients.name: berries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 1/2 cups frozen berries (I used strawberries and blueberries

recipes.title: Sangria Slushies

winePairing.pairingText: Frozen Dessert on the menu? Try pairing with Port, Moscato d'Asti, and Cream Sherry. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The Barrel Reserve Port with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 19 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Barrel Reserve Port
productMatches.description: It has a complex richness defined by chocolate and black cherry flavors and aromas, and lengthy oak aging that add spice, vanilla and bold tannins. This velvet smooth port can be enjoyed as a stand-alone dessert or can be perfectly paired with chocolate delights. Serve at 65 degrees F.

recipes.instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a blender along with a handful of ice and blend until smooth. Add more ice to thicken until the mixture reaches your desired consistency. Feel free to adjust sweetener to taste.

steps.step: Add all of the ingredients to a blender along with a handful of ice and blend until smooth.
Add more ice to thicken until the mixture reaches your desired consistency. Feel free to adjust sweetener to taste.
